class.name: AABB
class.description: AABB consists of a position, a size, and several utility functions. It is typically used for fast overlap tests.

method.name: AABB
method.description: Optional constructor, accepts position and size.

method.name: encloses
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [code]AABB[/code] completely encloses another one.

method.name: expand
method.description: Returns this [code]AABB[/code] expanded to include a given point.

method.name: get_area
method.description: Gets the area of the [code]AABB[/code].

method.name: get_endpoint
method.description: Gets the position of the 8 endpoints of the [code]AABB[/code] in space.

method.name: get_longest_axis
method.description: Returns the normalized longest axis of the [code]AABB[/code].

method.name: get_longest_axis_index
method.description: Returns the index of the longest axis of the [code]AABB[/code] (according to [Vector3]::AXIS* enum).

method.name: get_longest_axis_size
method.description: Returns the scalar length of the longest axis of the [code]AABB[/code].

method.name: get_shortest_axis
method.description: Returns the normalized shortest axis of the [code]AABB[/code].

method.name: get_shortest_axis_index
method.description: Returns the index of the shortest axis of the [code]AABB[/code] (according to [Vector3]::AXIS* enum).

method.name: get_shortest_axis_size
method.description: Returns the scalar length of the shortest axis of the [code]AABB[/code].

method.name: get_support
method.description: Returns the support point in a given direction. This is useful for collision detection algorithms.

method.name: grow
method.description: Returns a copy of the [code]AABB[/code] grown a given amount of units towards all the sides.

method.name: has_no_area
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] is flat or empty.

method.name: has_no_surface
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] is empty.

method.name: has_point
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] contains a point.

method.name: intersection
method.description: Returns the intersection between two [code]AABB[/code]. An empty AABB (size 0,0,0) is returned on failure.

method.name: intersects
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] overlaps with another.

method.name: intersects_plane
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] is on both sides of a plane.

method.name: intersects_segment
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [code]AABB[/code] intersects the line segment between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code].

method.name: merge
method.description: Returns a larger AABB that contains this AABB and [code]with[/code].
